title: Ticket #1536: SOAP: Optionally log all SOAP traffic.
description:
In the process of investigating #1535, it became clear that seeing the full SOAP traffic in and out of the daemon would be very helpful. In particular we're interacting with a third-party client with subtly different semantics than we expect. Seeing the exact sequence of calls would make reproducing the problem easier.

I'm picturing something similar to the logging the condor_gridmanager can do for the GAHP traffic.

We might want to hook in to gSOAP's logging plugin.
